Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP42.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP42.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Server()
    Constructor to set Server.

    boolean allPlayersAreReady()
    Method to verify that all waiting players are ready to play (they will be ready after entering their name).

    Method to get the number of players set.

    Method to check if the nickname entered is already taken by the players in the waiting room.

    Method to check if the number of players has been set.

    Method to associate a ServerGameThread to each connected client that will manage it until the game starts.

    Method to start the game.

    Method to reset the Server.

    Method to run the Server, it only manages new connections.

    Method to set the number of players.
    void waitingRoom​(ServerGameThread sgt)
    Method to put each connected client on hold until the Server has reached the number of players needed to start the game, the excess clients will be expelled (closing their connection).

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Constructor to set Server.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Method to run the Server, it only manages new connections. Server admits until the game has started.

    • newClientInitialization

      public void newClientInitialization​(java.net.Socket client)
      Method to associate a ServerGameThread to each connected client that will manage it until the game starts.
      Parameters:
      client - client' socket

    • waitingRoom

      public void waitingRoom​(ServerGameThread sgt)
      Method to put each connected client on hold until the Server has reached the number of players needed to start the game, the excess clients will be expelled (closing their connection). The new game will be initialized by the last client who will satisfy the number of players.
      Parameters:
      sgt - (ServerGameThread that assisted the client during the initialization phase)

    • allPlayersAreReady

      public boolean allPlayersAreReady()
      Method to verify that all waiting players are ready to play (they will be ready after entering their name).
      Returns:
      true if they are ready, false otherwise

    • newGameInitialization

      public void newGameInitialization()
      Method to start the game. The Server takes note of the start of the game and delegates its execution to a ServerGameThread, so the Server will be able to manage new possible connection requests.

    • reset

      public void reset​(java.lang.String cause)
      Method to reset the Server. It restores the default values to be able to create a new game and closes all open sockets.
      Parameters:
      cause - (string identifying why the game should be reset)

    • getNumberOfPlayer

      public int getNumberOfPlayer()
      Method to get the number of players set.
      Returns:
      numberOfPlayer

    • setNumberOfPlayer

      public void setNumberOfPlayer​(int numberOfPlayer)
      Method to set the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayer -

    • isNumberOfPlayerSet

      public boolean isNumberOfPlayerSet()
      Method to check if the number of players has been set.
      Returns:
      true if it has been set, false otherwise.

    • isNickNameUnique

      public boolean isNickNameUnique​(java.lang.String nickName)
      Method to check if the nickname entered is already taken by the players in the waiting room.
      Parameters:
      nickName - (nickname to be verified)
      Returns:
      true if the name is free (unique), false otherwise.
